CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( Review_Begins__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, (Review_Begins__c ) + 5+ FLOOR((5-1)/5)*2, 1, (Review_Begins__c ) + 5+ FLOOR((5)/5)*2, 2, (Review_Begins__c ) + 5+ FLOOR((5+1)/5)*2, 3, (Review_Begins__c ) + 5+ FLOOR((5+2)/5)*2, 4, (Review_Begins__c ) + 5+ FLOOR((5+3)/5)*2, 5, (Review_Begins__c ) + 5+ CEILING((5)/5)*2, 6, (Review_Begins__c ) - IF(5> 0,1,0) + 5+ CEILING((5)/5)*2, NULL)
CustomField.label: Review Ends Deprecated
